title: "PBE Currently Disabled" ???
body: I have been playing PBE a lot lately but stopped playing for maybe 6 days straight and now I went to log in and it says "This account is currently disabled" No joke have not gotten into any toxic fights to have gotten me banned, but I have submitted a ticket to try to help me out. Any suggestions ?

replies.body: I wasn't able to find a PBE account from the account you are posting from, but do see that you have an application pending.  If you had PBE that was accepted from another account, legacy PBE accounts were disabled and those players were given an opportunity to create a new PBE account via email.  Unfortunately, we aren't able to manually activate or create PBE accounts, if that is the case.  I hope that helps clear some things up, though it may not be the best news.
